about_the_game:
You play as Sal, a soon-to-be retired private detective who is down on his luck and ends up washed upon a private resort after having a few drinks too many on his retirement cruise ship!
Not long after your arrival, you discover that the owner of the resort has been murdered and the worst part? They think you've dunnit!

Find clues and solve puzzles to find the real killer, progress through the story by confirm alibi's and spotting contradictions, each character has a motive to kill and you need to prove they couldn't have done it!

The island is full of eccentric characters, all of whom have a motive to kill! Can you clear yourself and find the real killer? Or will you end up being known as the 'Washed Up' detective.


Gameplay:
  • Play as Detective Sal and interrogate other character to spot contradictions.
  • Gather character alibi's to confirm what happened on the night of the murder.
  • Discover the truth and uncover the lies hidden within character statements.
  • Re-enact each characters actions on the night of the murder.
  • 2.5D perspective, all interactable objects are 2D.
  • Find the real killer before it's too late!
